IdinSender
SendersEndpointIDIN
Requires the net.bankid.merchant.library V1.2.9
See also
Github - IdinSender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.extensions.idin.IdinSender
Syntax
Copy
<IdinSender configurationXML=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
configurationXML	text	-
Load configuration from XML. Attributes may overwrite this 'default'.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
action	options	-
Available Options: DIRECTORY, RESPONSE, AUTHENTICATE
merchantID	text	-
This is the contract number for iDIN the Merchant received from its Acquirer after registration, and is used to unambiguously identify the Merchant. This number is 10-digits long, where the first four digits are equal to the AcquirerID.
merchantSubID	number	-
The SubID that uniquely defines the name and address of the Merchant to be used for iDIN, if operating under d
